alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 12:26AM EST until January 28 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Rhode Island...Connecticut... Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Providence and Kent Counties. Pawcatuck River At Westerly affecting Washington and New London Counties. Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawcatuck River...including Wood River Junction, Westerly... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wood River...including Hope Valley...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pawcatuck River At Westerly. * WHEN...From early this morning to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs along the Pawcatuck River. Along Route 3 in Hopkinton, floodwaters encroach on lowest lying homes in French Village. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage, with a maximum value of 7.4 feet late tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.4 feet on 12/09/1972. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1230 PM EST.
